Title: Prohibits fractional pricing of certain petroleum products
Summary: Prohibits fractional pricing of any motor fuel for use in internal combustion engines in motor vehicles or motorboats; imposes civil penalties of up to twenty-five dollars per day.
LawCode: Amd ยง192, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to prohibiting fractional pricing of certain petroleum products
